name: Back In Time (Nwilliams8566)
description:
The first time you play through a level, it's just a normal platformer...  Until you get to a door and a button.  You must rewind back to the beginning, and start as a new character, all while the first character does exactly what you did the first time.

You get three characters, and if you still don't get to the goal, you can watch the characters playback what you did wrong.

Controls:

A and D keys to move.

Spacebar to double jump.

R key to rewind.

Credits:

All code, art, music, and game design was made by me (Noah Williams), during a seven day period of time.  This was my first game jam, and also my first finished project.
